Trey Fletcher, AICP, ICMA-CM
============================

[Administration](https://www.westlakehills.org/Directory.aspx?DID=4)
Title: City Administrator
Phone:
[(512) 610-6825](tel:5126106825)
[Email](mailto:tfletcher@westlakehills.gov)

Trey Fletcher began serving as City Administrator on May 2, 2022. As the chief administrative officer of the Type A General Law city, Fletcher oversees the city staff with an annual budget of $6.6 million and serves 3,444 residents. Prior to his appointment, Fletcher worked as the Deputy City Manager and other roles for the City of Pflugerville, Texas since 2006. In addition, he brings more than 25 years of experience serving in various planning roles with the cities of Lake Charles, Louisiana and College Station, Texas as well as a consulting firm in Houston.

Fletcher earned his Bachelor of Science in Geography from Texas A&M University in College Station, Texas. While there he was a member of the Fightin’ Texas Aggie Corps of Cadets, Company A-1. He is a member of the American Institute of Certified Planners, the International City/County Management Association, Texas City Management Association, the Urban Land Institute and Leadership Westlake – Class of ’23.
